content.title: Upcoming Presentations
description: Free Law: Resources, Technology & Legal Issues (Past, Present & Future)

Explore free legal research solutions in our webinar on Free Law with Justia CEO Tim Stanley. Discover key resources and delve into legal issues like copyright, privacy, and public access. Tim will trace the history and technology behind organizations offering free legal resources, examining the Free Law movement's evolution since the 1990s. Uncover the impact of litigation and court decisions on this movement, including notable cases like HyperLaw and Public Resource. Tim will also address legal concerns related to AI training with court records and government documents, exploring their implications for legal research and AI. Throughout the webinar, Tim will guide you to the best online sources for free law, covering Federal and US state, educational, and organizational websites. Join us for a cost-effective exploration of the legal landscape!

content.title: Upcoming Presentations
description: Effective Time Management for Attorneys

The upcoming presentation will explore strategies for improving time management to enhance efficiency, productivity, and financial gains, while also prioritizing mental well-being. As legal professionals, our time is invaluable and must be safeguarded, recognizing its irreplaceable nature. The webinar will offer practical, immediately applicable time management advice to optimize professional performance.
Law Firm Video 101: Establishing Trust With An Effective Video Strategy

Video has established itself as a powerful digital tool capable of highlighting a firm's personnel, skill sets, industry insights, and expertise. Its versatility extends not only across various channels but also allows for repurposing across different outlets. This seminar aims to guide you through the rationale behind and the strategic planning of a video strategy, providing practical insights to assist law firms in developing or initiating a sustainable, long-term video strategy. Join in this session with Robert Weiss to understand, assess, and ascertain how video aligns with and best serves the unique requirements of your firm.

description: Charisma In-Persaon and on LinkedIn: Business Development for Attorneys

Showing charisma is crucial for attracting clients and building a successful law firm. In today's competitive legal landscape, where numerous firms vie for the same business, charisma can be the decisive factor in winning clients over. S. Scott Mason, an attorney and professional speaker, and Marc W. Halpert, a LinkedIn coach and trainer, will explain the importance of charisma to legal professionals at all levels.
